response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, but considering its worth to you, I am confident it will bring significant benefits to your endeavors. I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $1,150,000, aiming to strike a balance between fairness and maximizing my return on investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the opportunity to facilitate this transaction and contribute to your success.", "product_price": 1150000}
